entries.name: EMPTY_HASH
entries.desc:
A base Hash object, supposing to be used when initializing a default empty
namespaces set, but is currently unused. TODO: either set the
namespaces=EMPTY_HASH, or deprecate this.

entries.name: each(element, path=nil, namespaces=nil, variables={}, options={}, &block)
entries.desc: Iterates over nodes that match the given path, calling the supplied block with the match.

entries.name: first(element, path=nil, namespaces=nil, variables={}, options={})
entries.desc: Finds and returns the first node that matches the supplied xpath.

entries.name: match(element, path=nil, namespaces=nil, variables={}, options={})
entries.desc: Returns an array of nodes matching a given XPath.
